knimeNode.name: Missing to Empty Collection
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts missing cells in collection columns to empty collections (i.e. a collection containing no members)

intro.p: The node converts missing cells in collection columns to empty collections (i.e. a collection containing no members)
This node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: Should the input columns be replaced in situ? If not, new columns will be appended to the table, with the suffix ' (Missing -> Empty)' added to their name(s)

ports.inPort: Table containing one or more collection (Set or List) columns
ports.outPort: Table containing the input table with empty cells in collections converted to empty collections
